trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contexto de sincronização para o modelo de aplicação do Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed when a control is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> é instalado quando um controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: The AutoInstall property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoInstall determina se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>é instalado quando um controlo é criado ou quando é iniciado um ciclo de mensagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> é instalado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Copia o contexto de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do contexto de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Dispatches uma mensagem assíncrona para um contexto de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: The Post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: O método Post inicia um pedido assíncrono para publicar uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>delegado para chamar.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O objecto transmitido para o delegado.

trans-unit.source: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context
trans-unit.target: Dispatches uma mensagem síncrona para um contexto de sincronização

trans-unit.source: If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the Send method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Se o thread de destino já não existe ou o valor do respetivo <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `false`, o método Send desencadeia um <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.
trans-unit.target: Trata-se até o autor da chamada para determinar a ação a tomar adicional.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>delegado para chamar.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O objecto transmitido para o delegado.

trans-unit.source: The destination thread no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: O thread de destino já não existe.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the currently installed <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> and replaces it with the previously installed context.
trans-unit.target: Desinstala o atualmente instalada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> e substitui-lo com o contexto anteriormente instalado.

trans-unit.source: If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se anteriormente instalado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>é `null`, contexto atual está definido como `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Se o contexto de sincronização atualmente instalada não é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, este método não produz qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>
